name: Sweet Anniversary
description:
JUST ANOTHER REGULAR DAY ON ARTHUR´S LIFE, OR IS IT?

It's Arthur's 18th birthday! Arthur is a little boy who just turned 18 years old today. Since most of his birthdays have always been unremarkable, Arthur is not excited at all. He doesn´t expect much to change this time either. 

Maybe this year, something will change.

On his 18th birthday, play as Arthur and discover what waits for him.

  • A narrative-driven, single-player puzzle game with a calm and cozy feeling.
  • A lot of different interactions around the house that help you to know more about Arthur and his family, especially the music that flows through his family.
  • Different types of interesting puzzles alongside with environment exploration.

This game is still under development so we would appreciate it  if you could fill this form with your feedback. 

Controls

-"Z" to interact.  -"WASD/ Arrow keys"  to move the player around the map.
